channel.title: Blood on the Forums VIII: Brew Over - Evil Wins
channel.description:
As the sun rose on a sleepy day in Ravenswood Bluff, the townspeople set about their daily routines, only to quickly take notice of the strange sight in the town square; a ghost, floating idly about, looking at its arm as if checking a watch.
“From whence comest thou, spectre?”
“Oh, come on, it hasn’t been *that* long. Surely you all haven’t forgotten dear Tangeld.”
“Wait… That name…”
“Did you think I was some fairytale? Well, I hope they captured my charm right in the stories. But if you’ve heard those… Surely you know why I’m here.”
“No… Not again…”
“Yes, again. But I must say…” Tan looked around the town to surprisingly few faces staring back at her. “…we seem to be keeping it personal this time. Ah well, maybe the faster pace will make things interesting. Now then, I won’t keep you any longer. Have fun with the demon hunting and whatnot!”
# Day 1 begins. The nomination phase will open at [date=2021-05-30 time=02:30:00 timezone="America/Chicago"].
# Players: 1. EliThePsycho 2. Wazza 3. SirDerpsAlot 4. PokemonKidRyan 5. Amelia 6. Marluxion 7. Blizer
For those who need it, a link to the game rules in the OP can be found here: https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/blood-on-the-forums-viii-brew-over-signups-7-15/87842
